gist.summary: Launched Polly, an intelligent Discord bot that bridges the gap between community chat and GitHub development.
gist.impact: Developers can now trigger autonomous coding agents, search the codebase, and manage PRs directly from Discord.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai Bee mascot welcoming a new friend: a cute, chunky 8-bit robotic parrot named Polly. They are surrounded by pixelated chat bubbles and code blocks, symbolizing the bridge between conversation and development.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot sitting next to a cute 8-bit robotic parrot character on a digital branch. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The parrot holds a pixelated speech bubble with code symbols. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
